briefTitle: An Extension of a Long-term Safety Study of ALKS 9072 (Also Known as ALKS 9070)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter Extension of Study ALK9072-003EXT to Assess the Long-term Safety and Durability of Effect of ALKS 9072 in Subjects With Stable Schizophrenia
summary: This is an extension of a previous study (ALK9072-003EXT). The purpose of this study is to continue to evaluate the long-term safety and durability of effect of ALKS 9072 in subjects with stable schizophrenia, and to allow subjects who are doing well on ALKS 9072 to continue treatment.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number and Percentage of Subjects With Treatment-emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs)
